sentences.english: Then, the characteristic components of purple tealeaf were studied.
sentences.chinese: 論文進一步研究茶樹紫色芽葉內含成分的特徵。

sentences.english: The slopes of the hills were planted with tea bushes.
The blend of Eucalyptus, Menthol and Tea Tree Oil helps Prevent foot odor and bacterial contamination.
sentences.chinese: 內含薄荷和茶樹精油，有助於防止腳臭和細菌污染。

sentences.english: Tea grows well in these fertile mountain fields.
sentences.chinese: 茶樹在這片肥沃的山地上長得很好。

sentences.english: Tea tree oil is a brilliant natural fungicide.
sentences.chinese: 茶樹油是一個輝煌的天然殺菌劑。

sentences.english: Tea also has hard, fibrous stalks to discourage animal incursion.
sentences.chinese: 茶樹也還長有堅硬的莖刺以避免野獸的傷害。

sentences.english: For burns or scalds , drop Tea Tree oil directly on the effected area.
sentences.chinese: 在燒傷或燙傷後，直接滴茶樹精油在創口部位。

sentences.english: Tea tree oil is a great antibacterial and also helps rehydrate your skin.
sentences.chinese: 而且茶樹油是天然的抗菌素，並能給你的肌膚補水。

sentences.english: Aloe gel, tea tree oil, bergamot, peppermint.
sentences.chinese: 蘆薈凝膠，茶樹油，佛手柑，薄荷。

sentences.english: Tea tree and oregano are known for their antimicrobial nature.
sentences.chinese: 茶樹和牛至，因其抗菌功能而著名。

sentences.english: Tea was transplanted from China to India and Sri Lanka.
sentences.chinese: 茶樹是從中國移種到印度和斯里蘭卡的。

sentences.english: Tea tree essential oil can also be used has a treatment for cold sores, acne, verrucae and warts.
sentences.chinese: 茶樹精油也可有效治療脣皰疹，痤瘡，肉贅和肉疣。

sentences.english: Based on sequence homology, it was suggested that the obtained cDNA was a SAM gene in tea plant.
sentences.chinese: 證實所獲得的基因序列爲茶樹SAM合成酶基因。

sentences.english: When they stopped using lavender and tea-tree, the boys’ chests returned to normal.
sentences.chinese: 他們停止解除薰衣草和茶樹油後，胸部就返回正常。

sentences.english: The method enables tea trees to grow more exuberantly so as to obtain more high-quality tea.
sentences.chinese: 此方法能使茶樹生長更旺盛，以獲得更多的優質茶葉。

sentences.english: The bush is generally kept trimmed to a convenient picking height of 70 to 80 centimetres.
sentences.chinese: 茶樹一般修剪到70至80釐米這樣便於採摘的高度。

definition: an expensive type of oolong tea
